scripts.build: rimraf public && npm run -s og-image && npm run -s deck
scripts.deck: marp --no-stdin index.md -o public/index.html && ncp assets public/assets
scripts.vercel-build: yum install nss mesa-libgbm -y && MARP_USER=root CHROME_PATH=$(npx -y @puppeteer/browsers@latest install chrome@stable --path $(realpath ./tmp) | awk '{print $2}') npm run build
scripts.deck-einf: marp --no-stdin defi-einfuehrung.md -o public/index.html && ncp assets public/assets
